h1: Calories in In-N-Out Double Double Protein Style

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out Double Double Protein Style burger has 330 calories and 37 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in In-N-Out Double Double Protein Style?
What's the protein in In-N-Out Double Double Protein Style?
faqs.a: 37 g of protein, making it a high-protein fast food option.

faqs.q: Why is Protein Style lower in carbs?
faqs.a: It uses lettuce instead of a bun, reducing carbs to just 4 g.

faqs.q: How does Double Double Protein Style compare to regular?
faqs.a: Protein Style saves ~340 calories and 50 g carbs vs. the bun version (670 kcal total).

faqs.q: Is the fat high in In-N-Out Double Double Protein Style?
faqs.a: Yes, 33 g total fat (16 g saturated) mainly from cheese and patties.
